questions.q: Can I re-join if I exited earlier?
questions.a:
Yes! If you quit with a Diploma/Degree, you can re-enter.
Requirement: You must clear 'Re-admission Final Exams' (e.g., MAD2, PDSA for Diploma holders) to continue. Fee: ₹5000 per exam.

questions.q: Can I do this with another degree?
questions.a: Yes, UGC allows dual degrees. You can pursue this online while doing a regular BTech/BSc/BA on-campus.

questions.q: What is the SCT for OPPE?
questions.a: System Compatibility Test (SCT). It is MANDATORY. You must pass this test (usually a simple check of your camera, mic, and environment) before the actual OPPE. If you miss SCT, you will NOT be allowed to write the OPPE.

Exam: 3 hrs (Programming) or 4 hrs (Data Science).
Fee: ₹6000 (Gen/OBC).

questions.q: What happens if I miss a Quiz?
questions.a: If you miss one Quiz, the other Quiz score is considered. If you miss BOTH quizzes, you are ineligible for the End Term.

questions.q: Can I change my Exam City?
questions.a: You select preferences before every term. Strict Rule: You must report ONLY to the assigned center. Unauthorized center entry is strictly prohibited.

questions.q: Do I need a powerful laptop?
questions.a:
Minimum: 8GB RAM, Intel 8th Gen/AMD 4th Gen, 500GB Storage.
OS: Windows 10/Ubuntu 20.04/MacOS Mojave.
Webcam: MANDATORY for proctored exams.
